an2.245-249:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two blameless qualities. What two? (245) Non-anger and non-hostility … (246) Non-denigration and non-insolence … (247) Non-envy and non-miserliness … (248) Non-deceitfulness and non-craftiness … (249) Moral shame and moral dread. These are the two blameless qualities."
